dict.string: Diabfit needs access to read your health data to provide personalized diabetes management insights and track your glucose levels, heart rate, blood pressure, and exercise data.
Diabfit needs permission to save your glucose readings, health metrics, and exercise data to the Health app for comprehensive health tracking and sharing with your healthcare providers.

Diabfit needs camera access to analyze your meals for detailed nutritional information, diabetes-friendly insights, and GLP-1 medication considerations to help you manage your blood sugar levels effectively.
Diabfit needs access to your photo library to analyze meal images for comprehensive nutritional analysis, portion size estimation, and personalized diabetes management recommendations.
